name: Jonny Kim
review: Trusted by elite racers and enthusiasts worldwide, the Rekluse Core EXP auto-clutch is the premiere centrifugal clutch system. Using the principles of centrifugal force this clutch automatically engages and disengages based on engine RPM.

name: Michale Fillips
overview: The helmet is of the motocross type with a sun visor on top. It also sports multiple air vents to allow fresh air inside the lid.This helmet sports the special MotoGP livery, in blue shade.

name: Chrish Morrish
overview: These forged wheels place the highest material strength in the same direction as the operating load, creating a light and strong wheel. They feature a contour rim lip for a graceful arc from the rim to the lip. Matching PM rotor is also available separately.

name: James Leon
overview: This is particularly relevant for the heavy touring machines as it’s torque that rockets you onto the highway and it’s definitely torque that lets you effortlessly push a loaded bagger around slower traffic.

name: Rock Denver
overview: To keep rotating mass at a minimum, weight saving holes were drilled into every other chain link without compromising the chains strength.
